title: Zingy citrus Madeira cake
description: Madeira cake is more robust than a normal sponge cake - perfect for soaking with a citrusy syrup and a drizzle of thin icing.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing
200g/7oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
1 large unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only
1 large orange, rind and juice only
1 large unwaxed lemon, rind and juice only
